mapper.sql: s.fUuid AS `uuid`, s.fSupplierName AS `supplierName`, s.fContactPerson AS `contactPerson`, s.fPhone AS `phone`, s.fQq AS `qq`, s.fWeChat AS `weChat`, s.fAddress AS `address`, s.fUrl AS `url`, s.fEmail AS `email`, s.fRemark AS `remark`, s.fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, s.fCreateTime AS `createTime`
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_supplier s WHERE 1 = 1 AND s.fContactperson like '%${criteria.contactPerson}%'
AND s.fQq like '${criteria.qq}%' AND s.fPhone like '%${criteria.phone}%' order by s.fUuid DESC
